ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: New version check on opening designer.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: New version check on opening designer

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: Redesign Add Association dialog to be simpler, there will be 2 modes of defining new association: Simple and Advanced.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Redesign Add Association dialog to be simpler

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: Introduce [DataContract] settings(like IsReference and others) for persistent types and [DataMember] settings for propertiers.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Introduce DataContract and DataMember settings in Designer

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: User should define external type (simple - by defining namespace name and type name, like DSL designer does) which can be used as type for scalar properties.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Introduce simple 'external type' definition for scalar properties

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: T4 template (only C# project item template) was updated to decorate generated entity or DTO classes with [DataContract] and [DataMember] attributes required for WCF.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Update T4 templates to decorate classes with DataContract and DataMember attributes

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: T4 template (only C# project item template) was updated to generate DTO classes as an mirror to generated 'real' entity classes defined in entity model
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Update T4 templates to generate also POCO classes

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: In 'Add Association' dialog you can now specify Structure type in source of association.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Allow source of association to be Structure

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: Allow to set access modifier on get/set of property.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Allow to set access modifier on get/set of property

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: Add possibility to define Key settings on navigation properties.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Allow define Key settings on navigation property

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: When creating association (from dialog) and pointing properties to same type member 'ToSelf', then it generate 2 properties with same name and type in entity.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Create 'ToSelf' association creates duplicate properties

ProductVersionChangeDto.Content: Definition of scalar property type is redesigned, now is able to define boolean, timespan or any other external type.
ProductVersionChangeDto.Title: Unable to add boolean as type for scalar property

ProductVersionDto.Description: Alpha version 1.0.5.0 of DataObjects.Net Entity Model Designer
